repel.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if something repels you, it is so unpleasant that you do not want to be near it, or it makes you feel ill
repel.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to make someone who is attacking you go away, by fighting them
repel.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The army was ready to repel an attack.
repel.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to keep something or someone away from you
repel.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: if two things repel each other, they push each other away with an electrical force
repel.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: Two positive charges repel each other.
